activities: We will receive contact information about prescribers of diagnostic testing and will use this information to facilitate diagnostic testing for EU prescribers seeking diagnostic testing from US laboratories.  PLEASE NOTE: Identifiable patient information or health records will NOT be collected by BioRelay.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Marketing and Business Development
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, organization, email, phone, fax, address, medical license number(s), and any and all information linked to personally identifiable information. This includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: Dispute resolution program provided by the BBB (BBB EU SAFE HARBOR).
